text: Helena Žigon (13 April 1928 – 30 July 2020) was a Slovenian long-distance runner between 1946 and 2014. She was the oldest Slovenian runner who ran all Ljubljana Marathons. She ran the half marathon in Istrian on her 86th birthday. Žigon died on 30 July 2020, aged 92. ==References== Category:Slovenian sportspeople Category:Long-distance runners Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Yugoslavian athletes
title: Helena Žigon
